events.message: use constant references for strings in functions in wallet/*.*

events.body: utACK not sure about trivial though
As this is a code change this doesn't belong into trivial IMHO.

Agree, this should not be in trivial.

ACK

issue.title: [Wallet][DB] Back ports up to the CWallet/CWalletDB/CDB refactor.
issue.body:
Upgrading the wallet, wallet db and db wrapper areas with several back ports and updates adaptations.

List of PRs:
* #5933
* #7537
* #8191
* #8564
* #8574
* #8629
* #9353

Note:
Low priority PR, can be reviewing after merge Sapling and tier two PRs. 
I made it because we are pretty far from upstream in the db area and want to introduce some new functionality in the future that requires a more up-to-date db layer.
